body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to Elysium, Heaven, or Nirvana; Benefit: Members of this race gain spell resistance equal to 6 + their character level against spells and spell-like abilities with the evil descriptor, as well as any spells and spell-like abilities cast by evil outsiders.
name: Exalted Resistance
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Exalted Resistance
